tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon - 4th September, 2012, Full Episode - 334
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Episode - 334, Arnav hesitates to enter Anjali's room but Khushi urges him to comfort her. Shyam visits Anjali at the hospital and pretends to be devastated by the loss of their child. Arnav beats him and throws him out but Dadi defends Shyam. Shyam plans to use Anjali's miscarriage as a way to return to Shantivan. Dadi criticizes Arnav for bringing Anjali home from the hospital before her full recovery. Arnav warns his family not to consider bringing Shyam back to Shantivan. credit star India

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: i totally agree with u, but i can't get why anjali keep trusting shyam !!we know she love him to death,but what about her chotti did she﻿ think about him suffring for her and putting himself on fire to make her safe and happy ?she is too weak ,she must learn some lessons from khushi :))
i love the way of arnav beatng 2 shym keep it up arnav....beat him more as u can....i hate dadi﻿ role....I yhink she is wth shyam
Shyam good actor n very﻿ good villian n dadi omg hate her

Serial has become weird.One minute Arnav tells everyone,not invite Shyam inthe house,next min.shyam is﻿ inside the house.What happened to security.I hate Anjali's expressions,she seems to be unaware of her surroundings.And about Shyam's acting skills.it is MONOTONUS.twisted grins and monster faces.The serial is fizzing out,even arshi romance has become repetative.Best way is to stop watching.And if the track continues,many will join me.

I remember Anjalis room was full of glass particals and her blood due to bleeding of her feet.........what happen to that no one clean that room....Please CVs make﻿ sure u clear this things up before moving story ahead....Make sure u do give credit to ur viewers intelligence..

Arnav should join the wrestling... And whts wrong with dadi?? she jus came yesterday and acts like she was with arnav and anjali for the past 10 years!!! And shyam? mind if you do the Arshi fans a help?? Can﻿ YOU KILL DADI INSTEAD OD ANJALI??? It will earn you some respect, i guess..
Shyam Bagairat kia﻿ acting karta﻿ hai!!!
5:50 the sexiest face i have Shaym eva make ! ughhh! how ugli﻿ can he get! :/ & he deserves to DIE! everyone ride a car over him! arghh -.- typical kunt!
but i﻿ feel its not enough u see, 'coz this snakwa deserves more he should be beaten to the where he can't even see his filthy face (not Abaas) in the mirror.
shyaam is really a nice actor even﻿ he is playing a negative role .......love him
How much betrayed and shattered Arnav will feel when he will get to know about anjali meeting shyam and whatever has to come from Garimas side.. He trusts Anjali so much :(﻿
whatever shyam﻿ did in past with Arnav and Khushi, it didnt bother me much. part of play !!! .But killing one's own child.. this is simply TOO MUCH.. writers! not a very nice thing to show!!!
Urgh I hate Anjali, her own stupid husband killed her baby and she still worships﻿ him
Shyam is so cruel this﻿ shouldnt happen with anjali :(
shyam is such a good actor, he's a great﻿ villain!

Thank god for the punches. Now everytime I rewatch an episode or Shyam pisses me off, I'm going to come back and replay the slap and punch(ES) scene a bazillion times﻿ to feel better. Well played, ASR.
Mam, please get them marry soon and together. then create any problem we﻿ will tolerate. plz. don't break their marriage becaz they have already married
